entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
